title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Robotics and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Robotics and 

Automation Industry) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (robotics automation industry) order 2024

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

the design, development, build, operation, monitoring and 
maintenance of robotics systems and/or automation systems.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) design development build operation monitoring maintenance robotics system automation system

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 3. In this Order:
text_raw:
3. In this Order: 

"robotics" means the use of programmable machines to execute tasks without, 
or with a low degree of, human intervention; 

"automation" means the use of computer software, machinery and other 
technologies to execute tasks that would otherwise be executed by humans.
text_norm: 3 order robotics mean use programmable machine execute task without low degree human intervention automation mean use computer software machinery technology execute task would otherwise executed human

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th February, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [757] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 12 November 2024. 

The Seal of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the robotics and automation industry in 
relation to which An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall 
exercise its functions in the creation of statutory apprenticeships.
